title.rendered: International Human Design Conference Returns to Colorado Springs for a 3-Day Event

content.rendered:
The International Human Design Conference is returning to Colorado Springs to bring workshopping, speakers, and community in this year’s annual event.

Human Design Press is sponsoring this year’s event and hosting a bonus “Writing By Design” workshop for attendees to write their story through deeply aligning with their purpose.

One of the Largest Human Design Conferences in the World Returns to Colorado Springs for a 3-Day Event Aimed At Hands-On Learning & Growth Through Human Design.

People can really come away from this event as a full experience, having tried new things, made new friends in our community, and already implementing their takeaways from the presenters.”

— – Karen Curry Parker

COLORADO SPRINGS, COLORADO, UNITED STATES, June 1, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — The International Human Design Conference, one of the largest gatherings of Human Design leaders and practitioners in the world, is returning to Colorado Springs this September for a 3-day event. The conference will be held at the Marriott SpringHill Suites in downtown Colorado Springs from September 8th through the 10th, and will feature speakers such as Karen Curry Parker, Ellen Hefty, Evelyn Levenson, Adrienne Roach, and more.

Human Design is a system that combines elements of astrology, the I Ching, the Kabbalah, and quantum physics to create a comprehensive tool for self-awareness and personal growth. It provides insights into an individual’s strengths, weaknesses, and life purpose, and offers a practical framework for making decisions and living life in alignment with one’s true nature.

In addition to attending the conference in person, attendees will also have the option to attend virtually. This year’s conference promises to be the most exciting one yet, with a diverse group of thought leaders and practitioners sharing their insights and experiences with hands on exercises to guide attendees into further alignment with their unique design. There will be workshops and lectures intended to build on attendees’ foundations of Human Design and how it can impact areas of their lives such as relationships, business, and health. This year’s conference will be supplemented by a special pre-conference workshop titled “Writing by Design”, where attendees will work directly with professional Human Design writers and publishers to find the story within their design and bring it into the world in the form of a book. This workshop is sponsored and presented by GracePoint Publishing, a Colorado Springs based publishing house, and leading publisher of Human Design books through their Human Design Press.

“We are thrilled to be bringing the International Human Design Conference back to Colorado Springs,” said conference organizer Karen Curry Parker. “This year’s event is special because we have stepped away from only presenting lectures from our speakers. We now have a new model aimed at implementing what is being shared through workshops, so people can really come away from this event as a full experience, having tried new things, made new friends in our community, and already implementing their takeaways from the presenters.”

Early bird registration for the conference is currently open, with discounted rates available until June 30th. For more information on the International Human Design Conference and to register, please visit www.HumanDesignConference.com.

Carly Fahey-Dima
GracePoint Publishing
+1 719-527-1404
